name: onepassword_events_api
description: This application includes a scripted input to ingest data into Splunk from the Events Reporting API. After completing setup you will be able to monitor and alert on important 1Password event data.

scripts.build: rm -rf appserver/static/build && mkdir appserver/static/build && npx webpack --mode=development --config webpack.config.js && node util/build_version.js
scripts.build-release: rm -rf appserver/static/build && mkdir appserver/static/build && npx webpack --mode=production --config webpack.config.js && node util/build_version.js

author: 1Password
